import React, { useState } from "react"; import styles from "./Student.module.css"; import { signUpStudent } from "../../store/student-slice"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import Form, { Title, Text, Email, Number, Password } from "../form/Form"; function Student() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [form, setForm] = useState({ class_grade: 9 }); async function submitHandler(e) { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(signUpStudent(form, navigate)); } function changeHandler(e) { return setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); } return (
Student Name Email Age Password
Address

); } export default Student;
